title: The 'Indrani' Diamond and Gemstone Haaram Set
materials: Cultured Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Elaborate floral design composed of intricately set diamonds. Features a central Ruby in a floral setting and a tear-drop Emerald pendant. The haaram is embellished with hanging cultured pearls. The matching Jhumki earrings mirror the floral motif and are finished with pearl drops.
colors: Cream (Pearls). A classic and auspicious color combination.
occasions: Diwali). Adds regal charm to both traditional and modern attire.
description: This exquisite Haaram set embodies timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The radiant diamonds, precious gemstones, and lustrous pearls are meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad. The 'Indrani' set is a testament to our rich heritage, making it a treasured heirloom to be passed down through generations.
